item.title: Unsupervised Training vs. Unpaired Training, or Is GAN Unsupervised?
item.description: Recently, I was asked about a question: what is unsupervised training and what is unpaired training? Are they the same or are they different? More related problem will be: does GAN belong to unsupervised methods? In this post, I want discuss this interesting and important problem.

item.title: About
item.description: My Chinese name is 徐世坚. Currently, I am a first-year Ph.D. student in Computer Science at City University of Hong Kong, supervised by Prof. Rynson W. H. Lau. I received my B.Sc. degree in Computer Science and Technology in 2018 from Nanjing University (Elite Program).
